title: The Stickit minister's wooing,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: Gilbert had been remitted to the Presbytery of Muirlands  from his own West Country one of Burnestown, because he had been appointed assistant to the Reverend Doctor Girnigo of Rescobie ; and it was considered more satisfactory that the Presbytery within whose bounds

title: The Stickit minister's wooing,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: But the Presbytery of Muirlands were sage fathers and brethren, and they knew better than that.

title: The Stickit minister's wooing,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: " Off, ye lendings ! " said Gibby the Eel to his heather-mixture knickerbocker suit, on the day when his Presbytery of Muirlands licensed hizn to preach the gospel.
